Title: [VIS1] Bio-Logic Engine Core
Body: Implement the base biological logic engine (BioLogic.ts) to handle DNA sequences, restriction enzymes, and ligation rules. Must support sticky ends and circularization logic.

Title: [VIS1] Sequence & Enzyme Nodes
Body: Create React Flow nodes for 'Sequence' (DNA input) and 'Enzyme' (Restriction cutter). Enzyme node must use BioLogic to generate fragments with overhangs.

Title: [VIS1] Ligase Node Implementation
Body: Create 'Ligase' node that accepts upstream fragments and validates compatibility. Visual feedback for successful ligation (linear vs circular).

Title: [VIS2] Focus Mode (Hyperfocus)
Body: Implement 'Hyperfocus Mode' toggle. When active, dim all nodes except the selected one and its immediate neighbors (radius 1). Reduce visual noise for ADHD accessibility.

Title: [VIS2] Semantic Level of Detail (LOD)
Body: Implement zoom-dependent rendering. High zoom = full details (sequences). Low zoom = block view (icons only). optimize performance and cognitive load.

Title: [VIS3] BioPython Exporter
Body: Create an engine to traverse the React Flow graph and generate executable Python code using Biopython (Bio.Restriction, Bio.Seq).

Title: [VIS3] Qiskit Exporter
Body: Create an engine to traverse Quantum nodes and generate Qiskit Python code for quantum circuit execution.

Title: [VIS4] Transcription Node (DNA->RNA)
Body: Add 'Transcribe' node. Support both Coding and Template strand inputs. Visual pulse on processing.

Title: [VIS4] Translation Node (RNA->Protein)
Body: Add 'Translate' node. Implement standard codon table lookup. Support DNA->Protein direct translation shortcut.

Title: [VIS4] CRISPR-Cas9 Node
Body: Implement CRISPR node with Guide RNA (20bp) and PAM (NGG) inputs. Real-time regex scanning of upstream sequence for off-target matches.

Title: [VIS5] Storage Abstraction Layer
Body: Define `IStorageProvider` interface to decouple UI from storage logic. Prepare for future switch to Cloud/SQL.

Title: [VIS5] Local JSON Import/Export
Body: Implement 'Save to File' (download .json) and 'Load from File' (upload .json). Ensure full graph state persistence.

Title: [Future] Cloud Storage Integration
Body: Implement `CloudStorageProvider` (Firebase/Supabase) to replace LocalStorageProvider. Enable cross-device sync.

Title: [Future] Accessibility Audit (WCAG)
Body: Audit HyperFlow Editor for WCAG 2.1 AA compliance. Focus on keyboard navigation and screen reader support for canvas interaction.
